lrc:
[by:有誰而過]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : 派伟俊
[00:01.000] 作词 : 冼佩瑾/方文山
[00:16.25]小派：You always have to do something
[00:20.20]Just to show the world that you exist
[00:22.50]So you try
[00:24.64]You hope they'll see
[00:27.10]If on this brand new day you'll look
[00:29.15]On the bright side of the same old street
[00:31.50]You will see
[00:33.21]What you deserve
[00:35.21]Jay：Let's go
[00:36.11]我说几华里我送别了过去
[00:38.61]他们说人生的结局非常的戏剧
[00:40.85]塞外羌笛孤城马蹄
[00:42.85]在武侠的世界里谁与谁来为敌
[00:45.26]合：La la la la la la la la la
[00:49.03]黄沙里用竹笔写下的字叫勇气
[00:53.61]Jay：You just have to try try
[00:56.24]To be who you are
[00:58.04]And you ought to fly fly
[01:00.94]Step into the light
[01:02.40]小派：And soon you will find
[01:04.01]Be yourself
[01:05.46]Somewhere deep inside
[01:07.15]There's a universe right there waiting to be unlocked
[01:10.39]The key lies in looking into yourself
[01:12.14]Jay：Oh Try try
[01:14.54]Just do what is right
[01:16.09]You'll fly so high high
[01:18.74]Let go of the brakes
[01:20.69]Be who you are
[01:22.29]Be yourself 'cause your power is on
[01:25.10]合： When you believe in what you've got
[01:27.68]You know you're perfect just be who you are
[01:38.70]小派：So they don't see what you're made of
[01:41.65]But I like you and I know they're wrong
[01:43.95]Now it's time
[01:46.19]To show them what you got
[01:48.77]Let the blue skies cheer you on
[01:50.72]Embrace the wind we'll ride along
[01:53.07]You're perfect when you're who you are
[01:57.40]Jay：这世界有些事有些人凭感觉
[01:59.81]别管他旌旗密布遍野狼烟霜雪
[02:01.96]那故事在穿越而我也在翻页
[02:04.19]一行行做好准备敏锐而直接
[02:06.39]合：La la la la la la la la la
[02:10.54]爱不灭真实的一切废话全收回
[02:15.06]小派：You just have to try try
[02:17.83]To be who you are
[02:19.39]Jay：And you ought to fly fly
[02:22.27]Step into the light
[02:23.81]小派：And soon you will find
[02:25.56]Be yourself
[02:26.92]Somewhere deep inside
[02:28.70]There's a universe right there waiting to be unlocked
[02:31.61]The key lies in looking into yourself
[02:33.80]Jay：Oh Try try
[02:35.96]Just do what is right
[02:37.68]You'll fly so high high
[02:40.43]Let go of the brakes
[02:42.08]合： Be who you are
[02:43.78]Be yourself 'cause your power is on
[02:46.78]When you believe in what you've got
[02:49.13]You know you're perfect just be who you are
[02:59.77]小派：You just have to try try
[03:03.07]To be who you are
[03:04.62]Jay：And you ought to fly fly
[03:07.49]Step into the light
[03:08.94]小派：And soon you will find
[03:10.84]Be yourself
[03:12.19]Somewhere deep inside
[03:13.89]There's a universe right there waiting to be unlocked
[03:17.09]The key lies in looking into yourself

[03:21.00]Just do what is right
